TopicTitle: When will the asteroid retrieval mission be released?

Articles.Content: I have heard about ARM nasa mission pack for a while now but I dont think if ever seen a release date for it. Will the ARM be released at the same time as 0.24 (if so, has there been a release data announced yet)?

Don't ask for release dates because you will not get one -- you've been a member long enough to know that

More info here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/265-Kerbal-Space-Program-Asteroid-Redirect-Mission-The-FAQ

They said they are in the last step of the development - the testing phase. I guess it'll take at most two or three weeks until release.

But that's mere speculation. It'll be released soonTM.

when it's ready...

but also when NASA says ok.

...when NASA says ok.

So, a few years after it was planned, then?

So, a few years after it was planned, then?

Squad doesn't have to deal with fundie conservatives who cut the budget because they think science is the devil. It'll be here soon. Have the patience.

Squad doesn't have to deal with fundie conservatives who cut the budget because they think science is the devil. It'll be here soon. Have the patience.

Science IS the devil in KSP though.

It's evil, it's driving us to killing Kerbals over and over and over

Squad does not communicate release dates, typically. You may hear one or two days in advance though just like with 0.23, but who knows? (not me)

Thread closed
